welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Drexel Heights, where the desert meets modern city living! Get ready to experience the unique charm of our town, known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all that our vibrant community has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tucson International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B at Tucson International Airport serves select domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Davis Monthan AFB Airport serves both civilian and military operations.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Davis Monthan AFB Airport is used exclusively for military operations.

wifi.note: WiFi access is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Avra Valley Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and chartered flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marana Airport serves all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passenger convenience.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Marana Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
